alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Mercer (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 10:57AM CDT until May 24 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at New Boston LD17 affecting Mercer and Louisa Counties. Mississippi River at Muscatine affecting Mercer, Rock Island, Louisa and Muscatine Counties. Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Hancock, Lee, Des Moines and Henderson Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Mercer, Henderson, Des Moines and Louisa Counties. Mississippi River at Rock Island LD15 affecting Rock Island, Scott and Muscatine Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Keithsburg. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Water affects low lying areas in Oquawka. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
